headline: Adobe (ADBE): Reassessing Valuation After New Runway AI Video Partnership and Creative Cloud Push
summary: Adobe (ADBE) just doubled down on AI video by signing a multi year partnership with Runway that plugs its latest Gen 4.5 model directly into Firefly and Creative Cloud workflows for professional creators. See our latest analysis for Adobe. The Runway deal lands just as Adobe is trying to shake off a tough stretch, with a near double digit 1 month share price return contrasting with a much weaker year to date share price performance and muted 1 year total shareholder return. This suggests...

headline: Wall Street Firms Cut Adobe Inc. (ADBE) Price Target but Tout Revenue Growth and Long-term Outlook
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the best forever stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On December 15, BMO Capital lowered its price target of Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) to $400 from $405. However, the research firm reiterated an Outperform rating, impressed by the company’s fourth-quarter and fiscal 2025 results. The company achieved record quarterly […]
